name: zipcodebase
title: Zipcodebase
description: Lookup postal codes, calculate distances and much more with Zipcodebase.
author: xmok

preferences.name: api_key
preferences.description: API Key from your Zipcodebase account
preferences.title: API Key

commands.name: get-postal-code-location-information
commands.title: Get Postal Code Location Information
commands.subtitle: Zipcodebase
commands.description: Receive information for one or multiple given postal codes

commands.name: get-postal-code-distance
commands.title: Get Postal Code Distance
commands.subtitle: Zipcodebase
commands.description: Calculate the distance between one and another (or multiple) postal codes

commands.name: get-postal-codes-within-radius
commands.title: Get Postal Codes Within Radius
commands.subtitle: Zipcodebase
commands.description: Convert a list of submitted postal codes into a list of postal code pairs that are located within given distance to each other

commands.name: get-postal-codes-within-distance
commands.title: Get Postal Codes Within Distance
commands.subtitle: Zipcodebase
commands.description: List of postal code pairs that are within a given distance to each other

commands.name: get-postal-codes-by-city
commands.title: Get Postal Codes by City
commands.subtitle: Zipcodebase
commands.description: List of postal codes based on a city

commands.name: get-postal-codes-by-state
commands.title: Get Postal Codes By State
commands.subtitle: Zipcodebase
commands.description: List of postal codes based on a state

commands.name: get-states-by-country
commands.title: Get States By Country
commands.subtitle: Zipcodebase
commands.description: List of provinces / states of a given country

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
